Sword's tutorial (Swedish terrain)

This demo shows the main features of Sword v4.2, on a Swedish terrain. It is mainly used to demonstrate Sword, but also as a training session in workshops

Profiles

  • Supervisor: use this profile to demonstrate Sword
  • Red: use this profile during the workshop on a additional screen to display the red view
  • Blue: use this profile during the workshop for trainee to train using Sword as a blue player

How to use it

  • As a supervisor, load the "all.ord" file to demonstrate the scenario
  • A a blue player (for trainees), load the "all_interactive.ord" file. All units with a * have to be played manually by the trainees

Scenario

  • The scenario begins with an invasion by the red units, crossing the virtual frontier (water). As a reaction, blue units will advance, recon the situation with an UAV, repel the red units using artillery, recom and clean the area of mines, then counter-attack.
  • During the interactive scenario, the trainee must give the following orders :
    • 05h46 : MBT Squadron 52 : Control (Österstad area)
    • 06h14 : Drone 39 : Report information on the frontier
    • 06h52 : Artillery firing platoon 71 : Operate on position (deploy)
    • 07h18 : Artillery firing platoon 71 : Fire (Grankulla area)
    • 07h39 : Artillery firing platoon 71 : Fire (Grankulla area)
    • 08h07 : MBT Squadron 52 : Recon in force (Vedemö area)
    • 08h35 : Engineer recon 81 : Recon an area (Grankulla area)
    • 08h55 : Countermobility platoon 97 : Breach an area (Grankulla area)
    • 09h36 : MBT Squadron 52 : Seize (Sättran area)
